reviews.text: My family and I spent three nights at this hotel and we were very pleased with it. I booked it because its a Best Western and thought it would maintain good standards and I was not disappointed. It is clean, comfortable, quiet and very well run. All rooms have 2 double beds, big bathrooms and the hotel has a huge swimming pool and internet access. The food is good and it is well situated for both the waterfalls and centre of town.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I spent 2 nights here. The hotel was comfortable, clean, and enough staff spoke English. I suppose if we looking to walk around at night, this would not be a good selection because of a lack of things to see within walking distance, but this was not the case for us. After long days at the falls, it was just fine with us to lounge around the beautiful pool.
reviews.title: Good Food, Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The included breakfast was among the best we had in Brazil,. and believe me when I say we had lots of good breakfasts.
reviews.title: It was pretty sad, but we'd do it again because the falls were so worth it!

likes.liked: — The driver they arranged for us to transport us to the airport.
likes.disliked: — The fact that they lost our reservation.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we first arrived, they claimed to not have our reservation. When we produced our written confirmation, they quickly found a room for us.
reviews.title: 2nd Best Western

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was pretty sad. Nothing to write home about. Cold and barren. But, unless you wanted to fork out big bucks and stay at a nice place within Iguazu park, this was probably pretty standard for the not-very-impressive town of Foz do Iquazu.
reviews.title: Good value, far from city center

likes.disliked: — The location is a bit far

reviews.text: There was a large buffet dinner and breakfast available. Much like the room, not anything to go out of your way for - but we ate there both nights because there just wasn't much else around town and we were exhausted after hiking around the park all day.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel
